title: (x) Hand drawn bubble font - various {gang}
content: Hi there, does anyone know of any fonts similar to this? I've seen similar type used alot recently and was wondering if there's a font like it. any help would be much appreciated. thanks. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054540im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68682.jpg)
author: creone

comments.content: Another alternate may be ' [Rubberneck](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054540/http:/www.1001fonts.com/font_details.html?font_id=925)', by Jakob Fischer / [PizzaDude](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054540/http:/www.pizzadude.dk/)..
